image.altText: Two woman are shown from behind walking into the Department of Education building.

items.synopsis: For decades, Victoria's education department shuffled paedophile teachers to new schools where they abused more schoolchildren. As the historical scale of the scourge in the Victorian public system becomes clearer, there are calls for the state to confront the issue with a broader inquiry.Â

title.children: A psychologist said it would be 'bloody stupid' to send Vincent Reynolds back into classrooms. The Victorian education department did it anyway

image.altText: A smiling middle-aged woman with long, dark hair sits on a rural property, holding a large truffle.
